meanings.definition: people who have a fear of flying
meanings.sent1: Aerophobes often feel scared when they think about getting on an airplane.
meanings.sent2: Many aerophobes prefer to travel by car or train instead of flying.
meanings.sent3: The aerophobes joked that they would rather swim across the ocean than fly.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of flying turned her into an aerophobe, avoiding airplanes at all costs.
meanings.sent5: The aerophobes trembled at the mere thought of boarding a plane.

meanings.definition: individuals who experience anxiety or panic attacks when in an airplane
meanings.sent1: During the flight, aerophobes may feel their heart racing and palms sweating.
meanings.sent2: Aerophobes often seek therapy to help them cope with their fear of flying.
meanings.sent3: The aerophobes on the plane tried to distract themselves by reading magazines.
meanings.sent4: The aerophobes' panic on the airplane was visible to the flight attendants.
meanings.sent5: The aerophobes' anxiety reached its peak as the plane hit turbulence.

meanings.definition: those who avoid air travel due to a fear of flying
meanings.sent1: Aerophobes choose road trips over flights to avoid their fear of flying.
meanings.sent2: The aerophobes canceled their vacation because they couldn't bear to fly.
meanings.sent3: The aerophobes found creative ways to travel long distances without flying.
meanings.sent4: The aerophobes' fear of flying led them to explore alternative transportation methods.
meanings.sent5: The aerophobes' avoidance of air travel became a defining characteristic of their group.
